_header: O man thou marrest in thy mind
_description: On the mysteries of Creation — twelve 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Hoc factum est a domino’

BLHar2251.First Lines:
O man thow marrest in thy myndTo muse how god hath marked and
                    made…
BLHar2251.Last Lines:
…Of thise poyntes rehersed and many one moIt is ynough the for
                    to Recordehoc factum est A domino
BLHar2251.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         131 (1913): 40-63: 41-3.
